description: Try our easy to follow Szechuan Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Szechuan Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour sauce and 2 tbs water over vegetable mixture. Toss until combined and mixture comes to the boil. Return chicken to wok and toss until combined and heated through. Serve chicken with rice. Garnish with coriander. Note: Place rice and water in a medium saucepan. Cover with a lid and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, without lifting the lid, for 15 minutes.

Reduce heat to medium-low and cook, without lifting the lid, for 15 minutes.
